website_summaries.verdict: Based on general user feedback, the New Balance 1450 was a comfortable walking gear. Purchasers adored how the high collar supported the ankle. The rugged style and snug fit also scored positive points from users. However, there were complaints about the waterproof feature with some saying it was not truly a waterproof shoe.
pros: The New Balance 1450 was one of the most comfortable walking shoes owned by the majority of reviewers
Many people liked the mid-cut profile because it provided ample ankle support and steadiness at the rearfoot
The snug fit was considered perfect by plenty of wearers
A lot of buyers stated that the trainer was affordable given its quality build and use of top-of-the-line materials
The rugged look of the footwear pleased multiple users
Despite its hefty build, some folks were impressed with how light the merchandise felt on their feet
A few individuals were delighted that the product was able to accommodate custom orthotics and inserts
cons: Several users were disappointed in the shoe's waterproof capacity: it started to let the water in after a few weeks of use
For a walking shoe which is not made entirely out of leather, a few shoppers found it to be pricey
A handful of critics noted that the trainer needed to be broken in because it felt stiff, especially at the back

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing New Balance for many years, and this is the first pair I've actually disliked. They are comfortable enough, but unfortunately the foam soles make a very noticeable and embarrassing swishing/squishing sound when walking. I gave them the benefit of a doubt for a few weeks, thinking that the noise would eventually fade after breaking them in for a while, but they are still as noisy as ever. Now I'm wishing I had returned them instead.
customer_reviews.author: Severian

customer_reviews.title: a smelly sweatbox, otherwise an excellent shoe for daily walking & light hiking
customer_reviews.text: I'd originally written a rave review for this shoe, which hits a really sweet spot in terms of hiking toughness and walking comfort. It originally seemed perfect for those of us who do a lot of daily walking, along with some occasional off-road hiking/walking. But, unfortunately, after about 3 weeks of wear, this shoe's significant weakness-- lack of ventilation -- began to make itself evident. Warning - this shoe will function as a sweatbox for your feet, with the usual ramifications -- including dry skin and odor control issues -- none of which are a problem with my other New Balance shoes. Too bad -- properly ventilated, these would've been the best shoes I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: What a DISAPPOINTMENT. NEW BALACE SIZING HAS BECOME TOTALLY INCONSISTENT AMONGST ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Mens 13 XW . The xw size is two wole widths smaller than the xw width in rest of the fresh foam line. So, I have to return them as they dont fit, way too tight to be a labeled as a XW(4E). THE XW(4E) WIDTH IS ACTUALLY A NARROW FITTING W(2E). What a DISAPPOINTMENT. NEW BALACE SIZING HAS BECOME TOTALLY INCONSISTENT AMONGST ITS OWN DAMN SHOES.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Seemed very comfortable. But even in wide the shoe is still ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed very comfortable. But even in wide the shoe is still very narrow. Also for the price they should be leather.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Osswald

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and dry shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid option (so far) for a Gore-Tex-like shoe that will keep my socks/feet dry. It says waterproof but I don't plan to submerge my feet while wearing these shoes to test that claim. I just want to prevent my socks and feet from getting soaked by dew or the occasional rainfall. Cushion is definitely soft so these are not going to replace my hiking boots either. They do provide solid traction on grass and asphalt and for the price I believe they should be an economical replacement for the pair of Adidas that were Gore-Tex that barely lasted a full year before disintegrating. Sticking with New Balance from now on!
customer_reviews.author: R. S. F.

customer_reviews.title: Gave me Plantar Fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: I walk 4 miles a day on sidewalk at park plus wear the shoes the rest of the day. Shoes are comfortable. I weigh 200 pounds. Bought first pair. Right heel collapsed in 2 weeks. Called Amazon and got them replaced. Second pair did the same thing plus gave me plantar fasciitis. I have never had this before. Have been in pain ever since. I usually like New Balance shoes. These have been total garbage for me. I wonder if I got knock-offs or something? These do not seem to be of normal New Balance quality.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: Long time New Balance customer and purchased these for trail walking. I use orthotics and toe room is ample. 2 months of 5 plus miles a day and still happy with these shoes. The soles seem a little soft and wear might be excessive on concrete as I walk mainly on gravel. Very comfortable but not waterproof as indicated more water resistant at best.
customer_reviews.author: Crush60

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for trip to Italy which would put me on cobble stones and pavement. I walked about 30 miles on this trip and found these shoes very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: G. Speck

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable alternative to a boot and I got for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I would not pay the standard full price, but Amazon had a huge discount on the 4E 10.5 so I gave it a try and so far so good. Have just worn around and not a ton of walking yet, but working out for now. May update later once the snow is gone and I put a few miles on them. Wish it were easier to search and find shoes on Amazon without having to click through every option and color to find the best price. Very frustrating part of getting shoes through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sasco

customer_reviews.title: True to size comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these and was leery about the fit. The first ones he ordered of another brand didn't feel like a wide width. These shoes are true to size, fit perfectly and are very comfortable. They felt and looked so good that he ordered a second pair so he could have 1 for work and 1 for going out
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Narrington

customer_reviews.title: Really High Arches
customer_reviews.text: For me personally, this product would be a 0 star, but that's more about fit on me than the product itself. I tried them on at home & they felt really good except the arch was a little uncomfortable. I thought I would get used to it, so I decided to keep them. I wore them on a couple of snowy days in a row, & by the third day my legs were in so much pain that I had to work from home. The shoes were too dirty to return so I donated them to Goodwill after only 2 days of wearing them. If you have fallen arches, AVOID THESE AT ALL COSTS
customer_reviews.author: Eric V Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sale item
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 14w, bought this in a 14w and it’s a near perfect fit. Maybe a shade small, but close to perfect for me. Construction is good, comfortable sole, ok arch support, and good, sturdy tread and platform. All around great shoe- especially for 50 bucks! I’d order a second pair if they came in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Foam?  Not sure what they mean by that - a little overpriced IMHO but otherwise a nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the "Fresh Foam" aspect of this shoe's name but it is pretty comfortable and sized correctly. Pricey however, I guess I was expecting something special in terms of the insole (foam) but it's just like all the rest as far as I can tell. Not sure it worth paying $50 more than I normally pay for NB shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheelinva

customer_reviews.title: Great but very little cooling
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these would be useful on any day, but I will agree with another reviewer who said that their feet sweat like crazy wearing these. Now, on a COLD day keeping your feet insulated is a great thing, but ideally I'd like a little more breath-ability. Other than that, the quality is solid, they aren't too stiff, and great ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Incredible work shoe with great arch support and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Husband needed a high performance shoe of great quality. New balance has exceptional arch support and durability in shoes. He wears them every day and walks continuously in his job. He has not complained about his feet hurting him since he started wearing these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the shoe except for the hook tie on top. Hate the hook ties on boots. They are just a pain in the butt, I feel they should be gone on every shoe. This shoe has the stability and comfort that I love. I don’t love all New Balance but this one is a beast.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Reed

customer_reviews.title: nice hiking shoes for the moneu, but a sweatbox.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: perfect fit. I normally wear size 10.5 on the wider side. Lightweight for a hiking boots/shoes. This felt more like a casual sneaker, which is a good thing. Waterproof. One of the more affordable waterproof hiking shoes, at just $100. Cons: major sweatbox. I wore a thin layered sport socks, and my shoes still sweat like i was wearing a full insulated winter boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Dc

customer_reviews.title: Soft like pillows
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed at how they look in person and more impressed how they feel. If I was to complain about something or rather request it would be about the laces. Otherwise good walking shoes or casual light weight boot.
customer_reviews.author: Roe1577

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband. The first few days he wore these shoes he was complaining about them not being comfortable. However, he said after a few days and breaking them in they were a little more comfortable. He likes them now
customer_reviews.author: Herron123

customer_reviews.title: great fit for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely hard to find a shoe that actually fits true to size anymore. Thankfully New Balance is a quality product that is a perfect fit and true to size. Although if you buy the all black version you will be punished with a higher price for not wanting to look like a circus clown with multiple bright colors all over your shoes. We unworthy slobs are supposed to look like clowns and must be punished if we want something that is all black.
customer_reviews.author: dissatisfied reader

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed in the seller
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed because this is a great shoe however they have it being sold as an extra wide... however when i look at the new balance website, they say an extra wide is 4e. However these are labeled in the shoe as a 2e. Very disappointed with the seller here because I love new balance. However they dropped the ball here.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: These fall apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in 2019, wore them for a couple of months last spring, a couple of months in the fall, and now they are just falling apart. The upper and mid-sole are separating which is sad because the rest of the shoe is like new.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Support and fit are exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent on all fronts. Can't believe how long the previous New Balance I got lasted and hope these last 6 years with the abuse my old ones took as well. Thanks for the speedy shipping too. Usually stuff from Ohio to Colorado takes like a week even with Prime. This took only 4 days. Keep up the great job. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: alien4343

customer_reviews.title: Great work show
customer_reviews.text: Bought the same shoe last year, I work construction and the right shoe finally began to fall apart, being water resistant was a huge bonus during rainy days. Highly suggest replacing the insole other than that its a comfortable shoe that will last through some serious work environments.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Swepston

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and waterproof so far.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable lightweight and waterproof so far. Not that I'm wading or puddle jumping. I just need to be able to walk dog in rain and keep feet dry, which it does. 1 star off because on wet smooth surface it will lose traction. Good on rough surface or dirt/mud. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: da cap10

customer_reviews.title: Pointy Toe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lightweight. Toe comes to more of a point than desired. And $109 was way more than similar sneakers sold by Sketchers that I bought after for $60.
customer_reviews.author: GreggNYC11

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: bought these because of a review saying how great they are walking on concrete......THEY WERE RIGHT !!! getting another pair doug
customer_reviews.author: rolltide

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the most comfortable walking shoe I've ever had. Worth the high price tag so far, hopefully they prove to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bugz

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9.5 extra wide and I can live with it, but it is narrower than my 9.5 extra wide new balance running shoes. The laces are difficult to keep tied. They provide good support and traction, but I would not call them a highly cushioned shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Colwell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with good support
customer_reviews.text: My second pair, I like these shoes for the support and it seems the sole is wider and gives me more stability.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: I like my shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the shoe but after awhile of wearing it the right shoe started to hurt the side of my right foot ...my toes on my right foot were amputated and i think caused my right foot to become wider then the left foot ....all in all I like the style of the shoe ......
customer_reviews.author: Marvin D. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: A great, well-made, walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, stable to prevent ankle turning, comfortable, fits as expected, excellent sole design. Expensive, but should last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Truth

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable,good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received them and was delighted.Quality as always on top,still didn't,but I will have no problems.I have a wide leg and they fit perfectly.Recommend))
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Stiff insole
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff and uncomfortable insole. Sent them back. Not what I expected from New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a bad foot due to a fall from 20ft. So his shoes have to be comfortable and able to get on and off easily, and these are exactly what he wanted. They are light weight and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Derevenko

customer_reviews.title: not built to wear!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a Butcher shop on the processing floor don't even wear them all the time and the soul came off at about 6 weeks. so if you plan to wear these i wouldn't buy them
customer_reviews.author: barn hauler

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Foam - Kind to the Feet
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable walking shoe for those with foot problems. The toe box was a bit tight even on the wide version. Your feet will definitely stay warm with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Speis

customer_reviews.title: worn out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear when it is raining and i have to walk my dog. I have worn them maybe 10 times and they leak water already. So much for waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but HOT
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable, but HOT! They do not breath well at all. My feet sweat even in the middle of winter in Ohio.
customer_reviews.author: mleite172

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these twice a year for my son who is a FedEx delivery driver. He says they are the most comfortable work shoes he has worn and he especially likes that they are waterproof . They are worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: grandmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for a big man!
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with my feet and these have helped me very much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Great Look
customer_reviews.text: Long standing New Balance customer. This shoe, like all NB I have, fits well, looks great, and is priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good fit, look great!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are hella comfortable! No squeaking! And my wife says I don't look like an old man in white tennies.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit great. I feel like sprinting into action! So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, New Balance is known for making comfortable shoes and this one is no different...
customer_reviews.author: Bighousefan

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to keep these. I bought 14 4E. The width was fine but they fit like 12.5 - 13s. I have other New Balance shoes that are 14 4E and fit perfect. Disappointed these fit small so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: jeff t

customer_reviews.title: They come narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looks great, a side from the weird sound when your walking. It's like crumpling paper sound. It seems like some material rubbing against each ither.
customer_reviews.author: Luis L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable shoe. I went up a half size and was glad I did. I got the brown, there were half the price of the black?
customer_reviews.author: Griddog

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing every shift for about 6 weeks. These are very comfortable and wide for my flintstone feet, my feet don’t hurt during or after work.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: My favorite casual shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel great. I'm thinking about buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: BigRedGuy

customer_reviews.title: Narrow!
customer_reviews.text: Extra wide is still narrow. They use the same sole for both.
customer_reviews.author: Omalleyoop

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe! Can wear them all day!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable! They're rather stylish as well. Didn't have to break them in
customer_reviews.author: Carlito

customer_reviews.title: A shoe that fits!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfortable. I took a chance and ordered a slightly larger size so I can add an insole and still wear thick socks. It feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Kolohe 20

customer_reviews.title: Great find...
customer_reviews.text: Really great shoes... I would recommend them to anyone needing a shoe that wears like a sport shoe with the qualities of a boot... Great job New Balance.!!!
customer_reviews.author: W.Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who walks all day at work. He loves how comfortable and breathable the shoes are
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Bentes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for standing and walking for long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly! Very cushioned. Comfortable for standing and walking for long periods of time. Best shoe ever!
customer_reviews.author: timcamk

customer_reviews.title: New Balance
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were perfect. They fit just right for wide width.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bedosti

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: The size was smaller than anticipated. Narrower than other New Balance shoes I have bought in the past at the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a BIG guy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 6'4" 340# boyfriend who wears a size 17 shoe. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Russell Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and seems like a good walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, and good for walking which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Screws and plate in ankle
customer_reviews.text: If you have screws and a plate in your ankle, do not buy these shoes. The tops hit right on the screws and it hurts. They are not as comfortable as one thinks. Very stiff and hardly no cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On my feet at work, these comfortable tho.
customer_reviews.text: These are so perfect at work-being a #frontlineessentialworkerhere I am on feet but the comfort of these while working an walking and standing Feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised, fit good, and I am happy with the shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Adams

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Would've been good uniform shoes had the fit not been too narrow. Ordered my usual NB side 10 4E. Length is fine, but they fit more like 2E. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: albertsystem

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a unique firm but soft sole feel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing NB walking shoes for years. These are a good as any I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What Happened to New Balance
customer_reviews.text: New Balance has become such a disappointment. I swore by New Balance for years. Now you don't know what you are getting. One pair can say 12D and fits like a 13 4X. A 13 XW as was this pair fit like a 12D. Never again New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Damn good shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problem with this shoe. Damn good. I am on my feet at work, at least 7 hours out of the day. Once broken in, you will not need another shoe. I will be buying another pair in case they are discounted...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Crazy comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They feel great on my feet. Very solid and best of all crazy comfortable. I use them for work.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: great quality great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are waterproof and have nice arch support. I got these for my son who needs to use ankle braces and these are almost just as supportive . Awesome shoes by New Balance
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot that wears like a sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fit even with my orthotics. Needed a good walking boot for taking my dog out in the winter, these are perfect and the Gore-Tex makes them awesome in any weather.
customer_reviews.author: Woosi72

customer_reviews.title: One the most comfortable sneaker EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Just comfortable the first time. I bought 4 pair. Just in case 🙂 Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product fits perfect a little costly but happy with them
customer_reviews.author: christopher cutler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and was pretty comfortable. Was not expecting it to feel as good as they did. I am pretty picky about shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: after a few walks and breaking them in, they are getting more comfortable and seem to have a nice cushion.
customer_reviews.author: clint

customer_reviews.title: It's a great, comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the mid ankle height and the color. I bought them for work but felt they were too nice for that. I will wear them for most anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit...great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 1 week trip to Japan. A lot of rail riding but also a lot of walking. 86 miles to be exact if my iPhone app was correct. Wore these shoes for every step.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas S. Latham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Run longer than other NB shoes in same size... Wanted to exchange but system didn't offer the option.. just refunded payment..
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Top quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: The size I ordered fit perfect, The shoes feel comfortable and look good. A very good shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.author: danny ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor work
customer_reviews.text: I cut grass in these shoes for 12 hours a day. They are a little warm but I don’t care. Great shoes for walking on pavement and grass. Just buy them. Your feet will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Schuler

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for wet grass, BARLEY. These are NOT WATERPROOF!!!!! The shoes are great BUT, I got because they said waterproof, I wish I had read more of the reviews
customer_reviews.author: Robert R, Hampton

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but just horrible my hip hurt my knee hurt I put on my old worn out basketball shoes New Balance but I was all better
customer_reviews.author: steven dunsmoor

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: the shoe size fit as I expected. And the delivery was fast
customer_reviews.author: JY max

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 2E width and the 4E was perfect...I use boots for work...the most comfortable work boots I’ve ever had....plus it’s waterproof too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy again
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit, comfort. Rugged, looks and feels like new, months after daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dondero

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I love New Balance's shoe sizing. Fits perfectly with 2E width.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: NB Shoes
customer_reviews.text: A nice wide comfortable toe box with plenty of padding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice n comfortable, I’m on my feet all day at work. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Travis Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: good feeling walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and supportive for daily walks with the dog
customer_reviews.author: William Cass

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, it perfect fits my feet, I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: carson

customer_reviews.title: Priced right
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable water resistant shoe good for my type of job. Delivery driver.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mattenklott

customer_reviews.title: Seems like every New Balance I get they are a size ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the 3rd set of New Balance shoes I've ordered. ALL three have fit a whole size too big. I wear 10.5s in Nike. Seems like every New Balance I get they are a size too big. I reordered 10s and they had 1/2 inch space still. I didn't want to wait more days to reorder so I stayed with the 10s. Just fyi
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: He liked them but he wanted black. I returned them with zero problem. He said they were very comfy and I said just keep them then and I got the typical guy response. "I already have 2 pair of sneakers." ??? This does not compute!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Hiking Sneaker Great!
customer_reviews.text: It fit me perfectly right out of the box. I purposely ordered a heavier sneaker (as opposed to the lighter running sneakers and cross trainers). I have nerve damage in my feet from 2 lower back surgeries. This heavier shoe is perfect for my feet. My previous New Balance Sneakers were the lighter 517 which were a great sneaker but for my foot problem my foot never felt normal when just walking. I'm not a runner or a hiker. I just walk. But this hiking sneaker is perfect for my foot. It's heavy and holds my foot tightly and when I walk it feels like it's supposed to feel.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund J. Witkowski III

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Mw1450w1 Walking Shoe
feature_bullets: Plush tongue and collar. Breathable fabric lining offers a great in-shoe feel. Removable cushioned insole. Fresh Foam™ innovative midsole created from a single piece of foam that provides a plush, more natural ride. Rubber outsole with outdoor lugging delivers light cushioning and trail traction. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb 2 oz Shaft: 4 3⁄4 in Product measurements were taken using size 12, width 4E - Extra Wide. Please note that measurements may vary by
The New Balance® MW1450W1 Walking shoe combines rugged durability with modern comfort for a versatile style that easily lets you transition from the trails to the city sidewalks.
Leather, mesh, and TPU upper materials are wrapped in a waterproof bootie for ultimate versatility on the trail.
Mid-profile design for added ankle protection.
